front.title: IEEE Standard Test Code for Liquid-Immersed Distribution, Power, and Regulating Transformers Corrigendum 1:Editorial and Technical Corrections

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The definition of constant k in Equation 2 (in 8.3) and line terminal rated voltage in the last paragraph of 10.8.2 are corrected in this corrigendum.
